verbs.description: Sen. John McCain 's [V: dying] [ARG1: wish] is for President Trump to stay far away from his funeral , according to friends of the Arizona Republican .
[ARG1: Sen. John McCain 's dying wish] [V: is] [ARG2: for President Trump to stay far away from his funeral] , [ARGM-ADV: according to friends of the Arizona Republican] .
Sen. John McCain 's dying wish is for [ARG1: President Trump] to [V: stay] [ARG3: far away from his funeral] , according to friends of the Arizona Republican .
